sentence: (photo credit: Hannah Beier/Reuters) If he wins the Senate race in Pennsylvania this coming November, Mehmet Oz, famous throughout the world as Dr. Oz, will become the first Muslim ever to hold a United States Senate seat.
author: SHMULEY BOTEACH
title: Will first US Muslim senator condemn Iran deal?

sentence: “American Leadership Action” was established to back the candidacy of Mehmet Oz, the TV doctor turned Republican running for Senate in Pennsylvania.
author: RON KAMPEAS/JTA
title: AIPAC’s pro-democracy ‘super PAC’ does not mention Israel in its mission
